algorithm_technique: Stack-based evaluation of Reverse Polish Notation (RPN)
problem_summary_simple: Evaluate an arithmetic expression given in Reverse Polish Notation.
problem_summary_technical: Use a stack to process tokens; push operands, and when an operator is encountered, pop two operands, perform the operation, and push the result.
time_complexity: O(n) where n is the number of tokens
space_complexity: O(n) where n is the number of tokens (for the stack)
key_insights: RPN naturally lends itself to stack-based evaluation.
Operands are pushed onto the stack, and operators trigger calculations with the top elements.
Integer division truncates towards zero as per problem statement.
